div.p: Ensemble mean zonal wind and temperature response to the Halog + SAD forcing experiment during: ( a, b) First post-eruption NH winter (DJF). ( c, d) Averaged over NH summer of post-eruption years 1–3. ( e, f) Averaged over SH spring (SON) of post-eruption year 3–6. ( g, h) Averaged over SH summer (DJF) of post-eruption years 3–6. Gray contours represents the Control climatology of zonal wind (temperature) with intervals of 15 m/s (K). Stipling indicates changes at the 95% confidence level.
